Title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
Writer: Jirí Brdecka, Josef Kainar, Howard Sackler, William Shakespeare (play), Jirí Trnka
Actors: Joss Ackland, Ann Bell, Richard Burton, Tom Criddle
Plot: The first puppet kinescope in the world. It is based on the famous poetic comedy by William Shakespeare. Three worlds meet in this story: the noble world of three Athens couples, a common popular world of tradesmen amateur theatre and a fairy-tale happiness of magic creatures as elves and nymphs. The film is considered the most remarkable Jirí Trnka's work and a milestone in the history of the world animation.
